Footer.social_connect: Get connected with us on social networks:
Footer.company_description: Your adventure in the mountains of Granada and Andalusia starts here. Join a community that lives for nature.

HomePage.title: EXPLORE. DREAM. DISCOVER.
HomePage.subtitle: Your adventure in the mountains of Granada and Andalusia starts here. Join a community that lives for nature.

features.feature1_description: From easy family walks to challenging high-mountain treks for the most experienced. There's always an adventure waiting for you.
features.feature2_description: Connect with people passionate about nature. Share experiences, learn from others, and make lifelong friends.
features.feature3_description: Our certified guides ensure your safety at all times. We organize every route with the group's well-being in mind.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions or want to join? Send us a message or find us in Granada!
contact.map_alt: Map showing our club's location in Granada.

WeatherPage.title: Weather Center
WeatherPage.subtitle: Get real-time weather forecasts for any location. Plan your adventures with confidence.
WeatherPage.search_placeholder: Enter a city or zip code

errors.location_not_found: Location '{location}' not found. Please try being more specific.
errors.service_unavailable: The weather service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.unknown_error: Could not fetch weather data. Please try again.

RoutesPage.title: Explore Our Routes
RoutesPage.subtitle: Find your next adventure. Use the filters to discover the perfect trail for you.

RulesPage.meta_description: Our rules and safety guides to ensure safe and respectful adventures in the mountains.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.p1: This is a placeholder for the Privacy Policy. This text should be replaced with the actual privacy policy of the website.
PrivacyPage.p2: It should detail the types of data collected from users, how this data is used, and with whom it is shared.
PrivacyPage.p3: Furthermore, it should explain the rights users have over their data, such as the right to access, correct, or delete their personal information.
PrivacyPage.p4: Make sure to comply with all relevant data protection regulations like GDPR, CCPA, etc.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.p1: This is a placeholder for the Terms of Service. This text should be replaced with the actual terms and conditions for using the website.
TermsPage.p2: This document should outline the rules and guidelines for user conduct, intellectual property rights, and limitations of liability.
TermsPage.p3: It's a legal agreement between the website owner and the users. It's important to have this clearly defined to protect both parties.
TermsPage.p4: Consult with a legal professional to draft a comprehensive and legally sound Terms of Service document.
